title: AFF Toolbox
desc: A tool for generating Arcaea Fanmade chart snippets, including Arc cutting, chart offset, Timing easing and more functions.
category.new.name: Recent Updates
category.chart.name: Chart Tools
category.arc.name: Arc Tools
category.timing.name: Timing Tools
category.other.name: Other
tool.chartOffset.name: Chart Offset Tool
tool.chartMirror.name: Chart Mirror Tool
tool.chartAlign.name: Chart Align Tool
tool.chartAlign.shortDesc: Offset whole or segment chart (eliminates 1ms deviation)
tool.arcSplit.name: Arc Cutting Tool
tool.arcSplit.shortDesc: Slicing a full Arc into multiple shorter Arcs
tool.arcSplitByTiming.name: Time Point Arc Cutter
tool.arcRain.name: Arc Rain Generator
tool.arcRain.shortDesc: Generates random skylines that resemble raindrops
tool.arcCreaseLine.name: Crease Arc Generator
tool.arcCreaseLine.shortDesc: Generate crease Arcs based on one Arc
tool.arcAnimate.name: Frame Animation Utility
tool.arcAnimate.shortDesc: A triaxial translation Arc effect through using noinput timinggroup and hidegroup
tool.timingEasing.name: Timing Easing Tool
tool.timingEasing.shortDesc: Generate Timings for BPM gradual change
tool.timingGlitch.name: Glitch Timing Generator
tool.timingGlitch.shortDesc: Generate Timing groups that make the front and back of the chart jittery
tool.test.name: Test Page
tool.test.shortDesc: This is a page for testing forms
人类在神圣的沉默中学会历史。: Try random thing and come back.
tool.arcEnvelope.name: Arc Envelope
tool.arcEnvelope.shortDesc: Generate one Arc that enveloped by two Arcs
tool.timingEasingDisp.name: Timing Easing (displacement first)
tool.timingEasingDisp.shortDesc: Timing easing tool for precise displacement control
tool.scBlink.name: Timinggroup Blinking Tool
tool.scBlink.shortDesc: Generate scenecontrol statements that cause the timinggroup to blink
tool.arcBreak.name: Arc Breakpoint Shift Tool
tool.arcBreak.shortDesc: Cutting off the Arc according to the point in time and generating displacements at the breakpoints
tool.chartScale.name: Chart Scaling
tool.sketchImgToArc.name: Sketch to Arc Converter
tool.sketchImgToArc.shortDesc: Convert hand-drawn black and white images to a set of Arc drawings
tool.chartToSkyline.name: Chart to Skyline Tool
tool.chartToSkyline.shortDesc: Replace real notes with notes made of skylines
